ComicInfo.Series: G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero
ComicInfo.Summary:
After last monthâ€™s landmark issue, G.I. JOE is ready to make a change! With COBRA on the run and the Pit in shambles, DUKE leads the team into a brave new era, as new teams are formed and G.I. JOE finds another base of operations.
